helpText: Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization.

generic.title: Error updating categories
generic.message: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

maxDepthExceeded.title: Error updating categories
maxDepthExceeded.message: You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep.

destinationHasSameName.title: Error updating categories
destinationHasSameName.message: A category with the same name already exists in the destination category.

noSchema.title: Schema not found
noSchema.message: Item schema not found for user.

maxCharacter.title: Error updating categories
maxCharacter.message: Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long.

deleteInUseCategory.title: Delete category
deleteInUseCategory.message: ${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items.

custom.title: Custom categories
custom.message: Create your own categories to organize content within your organization.

arcgis.title: ArcGIS categories
arcgis.message: ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World.

iso.title: ISO categories
iso.message: ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information.

inspire.title: INSPIRE categories
inspire.message: INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive.
